newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Saudi fixes coupons on three to five year FRNs.
newsitem.headline: Saudi fixes coupons on three to five year FRNs.

text.p: The Saudi Arabian Monetary Agency (SAMA) has fixed coupons on three- and five-year floating rate notes, bankers said on Wednesday.

SAMA announced its second FRN issue worth one billion riyals on Saturday for settlement Wednesday. The rate for three-year notes maturing on January 29, 2000 is 5.8375 percent. The rate for five-year notes, maturing on January 29, 2002 is 5.9875 percent.
They are fixed at 15 basis points over the Saudi interbank offered rate for three years and 30 basis points over for five years.
